casebody.data:
In the Matter of K.B., Minor Child.
Appealed by Respondent Mother. No. 293P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Robert W. Ewing, Winston-Salem, for Cassia Barbosa. Renee S. Alt, for Buncombe Co. DSS. Judy N. Rudolph, for Guardian ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondent (Mother) on the 15th day of June 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the orders of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
